content: I'll definitely check out the Civic Center Theater's website and social media to see what's coming up. By the way, I've been getting more involved in the local theater community lately, and I've been thinking about taking an improv class. I actually participated in a workshop organized by the local theater company about a month ago, focusing on improvisation techniques. Do you know if there are any other improv classes or workshops in the area that I might be interested in?
